items.title: Seven ugly ducklings
items.author: Max Plank
items.excerpt: Son, as your lawyer, I declare y'all are in a 12-piece bucket o' trouble...
items.content: Son, as your lawyer, I declare y'all are in a 12-piece bucket o' trouble. But I done struck you a deal: Five hours of community service cleanin' up that ol' mess you caused. I just want to talk. It has nothing to do with mating. Fry, that doesn't make sense. Hey, you add a one and two zeros to that or we walk! Hi, I'm a naughty nurse, and I really need someone to talk to. $9.95 a minute. Is today's hectic lifestyle making you tense and impatient? Oh no! The professor will hit me! But if Zoidberg 'fixes' it… then perhaps gifts!

items.title: The princess and the motor car.
items.author: Henry Ford
items.excerpt: You've swallowed a planet! No… It's a thing; it's like a plan, but with more greatness...
items.content: You've swallowed a planet! No… It's a thing; it's like a plan, but with more greatness. You know how I sometimes have really brilliant ideas? Annihilate? No. No violence. I won't stand for it. Not now, not ever, do you understand me?! I'm the Doctor, the Oncoming Storm - and you basically meant beat them in a football match, didn't you?

items.title: How to date a pineapple.
items.author: Amy Adams
items.excerpt: Hey, Luke! May the Force be with you...
items.content: Hey, Luke! May the Force be with you. Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid. I don't know what you're talking about. I am a member of the Imperial Senate on a diplomatic mission to Alderaan

items.title: Unfinished salmon.
items.author: Mitch
items.excerpt: Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough. Army had half a day...
items.content: Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough. Army had half a day. That's why you always leave a note! I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. No, I did not kill Kitty. However, I am going to oblige and answer the nice officer's questions because I am an honest man with no secrets to hide.

items.title: Where's my toner?
items.author: Joe Burger

items.content: Graeme souness Daniel plainview id, id irrigator, crumb catcher bogie basket hold steady keyboardist jolly good show imperial old man in pub Daniel plainview graeme souness, sweat irrigator, Daniel plainview knavish rogue furry facial friend old man in pub bogie basket face broom hairy kiss. chevron graeme souness hold steady keyboardist crumb catcher jolly good show id imperial. Robert winston musketeer hold steady keyboardist fox hunting Milkshake issues quis, saddam hussein fox hunting john aldridge musketeer dick van dyke jimi hendrix Milkshake issues burt reynolds clone zone shopper quis hello, we’re cockneys robert winston hold steady keyboardist.

items.title: Wednesday last week.
items.author: Brian Adams
items.excerpt: There's only one man I've ever called a coward...
items.content: There's only one man I've ever called a coward, and that's Brian Doyle Murray. No, what I'm calling you is a television actor. What's Spanish for "I know you speak English?" Army had half a day. Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun.

items.title: The market research of a dank meme.
items.author: Sally Mint
items.content: Ah, the 'Breakfast Club' soundtrack! I can't wait til I'm old enough to feel ways about stuff! I didn't ask for a completely reasonable excuse! I asked you to get busy! Goodbye, cruel world. Goodbye, cruel lamp. Goodbye, cruel velvet drapes, lined with what would appear to be some sort of cruel muslin and the cute little pom-pom curtain pull cords. Cruel though they may be.
